extension_description.message: Whakamaoritia nga kuputuhi kua tohua ki te wharangi paetukutuku ka huri ki te whakatakotoranga kua tohua.

turn_off_description.message: Ka puta ake te paatene Whakamaori i nga wa katoa ka kowhiria te kuputuhi

turn_on_description.message: Ka kore te patene Whakamaori e puta ina kowhiria te kuputuhi engari ka taea tonu e koe te whakamaori ma te panui i te ata Whakamaori Pro kei te paeutauta

auto_switch.message: Huri aunoa ki te reo tuarua

auto_switch_description.message: Ina ko te kuputuhi kua tohua ko te reo taunoa, whakamaoritia ki te reo tuarua

second_target_language_description.message: Tīpakohia te reo ūnga tuarua taunoa

target_format_description.message: Tīpakohia te hōputu ūnga taunoa, hōputu taea te huri i roto i te paewhiri whakamaori

auto_set_format.message: Tautuhi aunoa i te hōputu taunoa

auto_set_format_description.message: Ina huri te whakatakotoranga i te paewhiri whakamaori, tautuhia te whakatakotoranga kua tohua ki te whakatakotoranga taunoa

format_and_order.message: Te whakatakotoranga me te raupapa o te roopu whakamaori

format_and_order_description.message: Whakahōputuhia nga keehi ka taea te whakarereke i te panui whakamaori me te raupapa whakaatu

translate_button_on_description.message: Ka puta ake te paatene Whakamaori i nga wa katoa ka kowhiria te kuputuhi

translate_button_off.message: Kaua e whakaatu i te paatene Whakamaori

translate_button_off_description.message: Ka kore te patene Whakamaori e puta ina kowhiria te kuputuhi engari ka taea tonu e koe te whakamaori ma te panui i te ata Whakamaori Pro kei te paeutauta
